Draw Logic Puzzle

April 13, 2025 Tags: Puzzles
Draw Logic Puzzle is a captivating 2D puzzle game built with Unity that challenges players to think creatively and solve levels by drawing lines, shapes, and paths. Each puzzle presents a unique scenario where your drawings become the solution&mdash;whether its building a bridge, redirecting a fall, or guiding the character safely to its target. With intuitive controls, brain-teasing mechanics, and charming visuals, Draw Logic Puzzle offers a fun and engaging experience for players of all ages.

Draw Logic Puzzle is a captivating 2D puzzle game built with Unity that challenges players to think creatively and solve levels by drawing lines, shapes, and paths. Each puzzle presents a unique scenario where your drawings become the solution&mdash;whether its building a bridge, redirecting a fall, or guiding the character safely to its target. With intuitive controls, brain-teasing mechanics, and charming visuals, Draw Logic Puzzle offers a fun and engaging experience for players of all ages.
